entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 12:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 14.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and early afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
